name: Reaction
flavor: Just wait for the right time aaaaaand... WHAM!
text:
- .
- Reactions must be declared at the start of round.
- You do not have to specify or decide which Reaction move to use when announcing that a character will react.
- If the trigger occurs, the reacting character may use the move during the instigating character's turn. 
- If no reaction is performed, the User may take their turn normally at the bottom of initiative, prior to characters with Negative Priority or who are Stalling.
